text: 2019 in men's road cycling is about the 2019 men's bicycle races governed by the UCI. The races are part of the UCI Road Calendar. ==World Championships== The World Road Championships were held in Innsbruck, Austria, from 22 to 30 September 2019. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |+ Events at the 2019 UCI Road World Championships !Race !Date !Winner !Second !Third !Ref |- !
